definition: to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]
good people are at peace with themselves, (but) there is no rest for the wicked
pinyin: jun1 zi5 tan3 dang4 dang4 , xiao3 ren2 chang2 qi1 qi1
containing_words.word: 君子坦荡荡，小人长戚戚

sentences.english: He was completely honest in his reply.
sentences.chinese: 他的回答完全是坦坦荡荡。

sentences.english: Haihe River, breeds up the cradle of Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 海河，孕育了天津这座城市奔放且坦荡的本性。

sentences.english: That the influential official also certainly has many person is good , breast is such as magnanimous.
sentences.chinese: 当然权贵也有很多人是不错的，诸如胸怀坦荡的。

sentences.english: As lunar Fire sign personalities, those with moon in Leo are magnanimous and passionate in the expression of their feelings.
sentences.chinese: 狮子座在表达自己的感情时是坦荡和热情的。

sentences.english: Frank was very kind , manly , open-hearted .
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克非常善良，有男子气概，并且心胸坦荡。

sentences.english: At the beginning of the seventeenth century a certain frankness was till common, it would seem.
sentences.chinese: 在十七世纪初，人们对于性似乎都普遍地坦荡荡。

sentences.english: The North of Huaihe River, as part of the North China Plain, is a vast expanse of flatland.
sentences.chinese: 淮河以北地势坦荡辽阔，为华北大平原的一部分。

sentences.english: The gentleman is easy, mean person often troubled at heart.
sentences.chinese: 君子坦荡荡，小人常戚戚。

sentences.english: I saw a starry night, the strength of your hand, be love.
sentences.chinese: 我看见狭长星夜，你手心的力量，坦荡的爱情。

sentences.english: I'm not worried; Crystal's going to be all right.
sentences.chinese: 不过我不担心，水晶以后肯定是星途坦荡。

sentences.english: I had been completely honest in my replies.
sentences.chinese: 我的回答完全是坦坦荡荡。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a look back at the road not forthright, but also a very Weicimei.
sentences.chinese: 某日忽然回望，路虽不坦荡，却也有滋味的很。

definition: open and candid (idiom); straightforward and upright
lit. light breeze and clear moon (idiom)/period of peace and prosperity/noble and benevolent character
